description: Searches quick connects in an Amazon Connect instance, with optional filtering.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: SearchFilter
parameters.description: Filters to be applied to search results. TagFilter (dict) --- An object that can be used to specify Tag conditions inside the SearchFilter. This accepts an OR of AND (List of List) input where: Top level list specifies conditions that need to be applied with OR operator Inner list specifies conditions that need to be applied with AND operator. OrConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition. (list) --- (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition, for example, HAVE BPO = 123. TagKey (string) --- The tag key in the tag condition. TagValue (string) --- The tag value in the tag condition. AndConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition. (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition, for example, HAVE BPO = 123. TagCondition (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition. TagValue (string) --- The tag value in the tag condition.

nested_params.name: TagFilter
nested_params.description: An object that can be used to specify Tag conditions inside the SearchFilter. This accepts an OR of AND (List of List) input where:

parameters.name: SearchCriteria
parameters.description: The search criteria to be used to return quick connects. OrConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition. (dict) --- The search criteria to be used to return quick connects. AndConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition. StringCondition (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a string condition. FieldName (string) --- The name of the field in the string condition. Value (string) --- The value of the string. ComparisonType (string) --- The type of comparison to be made when evaluating the string condition.

nested_params.name: OrConditions
nested_params.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition.

nested_params.name: AndConditions
nested_params.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition.

nested_params.name: StringCondition
nested_params.description: A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a string condition.

nested_params.name: FieldName
nested_params.description: The name of the field in the string condition.

nested_params.name: ComparisonType
nested_params.description: The type of comparison to be made when evaluating the string condition.

nested_items.name: QuickConnects
nested_items.description: Information about the quick connects.

nested_items.name: QuickConnectARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the quick connect.

nested_items.name: QuickConnectId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the quick connect.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the quick connect.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description.

nested_items.name: QuickConnectConfig
nested_items.description: Contains information about the quick connect.

nested_items.name: QuickConnectType
nested_items.description: The type of quick connect. In the Amazon Connect admin website, when you create a quick connect, you are prompted to assign one of the following types: Agent (USER), External (PHONE_NUMBER), or Queue (QUEUE).

nested_items.name: UserConfig
nested_items.description: The user configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is USER.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the user.

nested_items.name: ContactFlowId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the flow.

nested_items.name: QueueConfig
nested_items.description: The queue configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is QUEUE.

nested_items.name: QueueId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the queue.

nested_items.name: ContactFlowId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the flow.

nested_items.name: PhoneConfig
nested_items.description: The phone configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is PHONE_NUMBER.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number in E.164 format.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.

nested_items.name: ApproximateTotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of quick connects which matched your search query.
